The claim originated from a Facebook pos: stating that KXL Radio in Portland reported that firefighters were being shot at by suspected Antifa and BLM members.
Another Facebook user: Mike McAllister, also shared the same claim on September 11, but the post was apparently removed after it was found to be false by PolitiFact.
KXL News Director Jim Ferretti confirmed: s shows reported that suspected Black Lives Matter or Antifa activists shot firefighters in Portland.
